entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 7:30 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: S 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches developing in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
